Articles.Content:
KSP 2
My sepcs : W10 Pro 22H2
Gigabyte B550 AORUS PRO V1.0 BIOS F15C
AMD Ryzen 5 3600X 6-Core 3.80 Ghz AM4
Nvidia GeForce RTX 2070 Super
16 Go Ram
Display : Asus VG32V

 

1- Into VAB, rocket build with a RC-HL02, but warning about vessel without any control system

2- launching rocket (multiples tests) : once no control, once another time control ok. Random behavior replicated several time.

3- after a launch with control from ground to orbit, when decoupling (TD-50), 1st stage to 2nd by space bar tap => loss all vessel control

No kerbal onboard, only the RC-HL02
